name: Besieged
description:
The kingdom is under attack! Defend your castle against the invading army of bandits by purchasing allies to assist you, upgrade your weapons and armour then join the fight in this medieval combat simulator.

Besieged is a top-down, medieval fighting game where you must fight along side allies to defeat waves of the invading army of bandits. After each wave you are able to purchase weapons, armor and units to assist you in the fight.

Key features

-Tactical combat
-Purchase allies to fight by your side
-upgrade weapons and armour
-Fight against waves of bandits
